ygData.subject: Re: Twisting question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hawkeye is completely right.  I started a character and put 20 points into dex and 5 points into strength.  By level 8 I was sick of having to go back and sell
ygData.messageBody:
Hawkeye is completely right. I started a character and put 20 points into
dex and 5 points into strength. By level 8 I was sick of having to go back
and sell so often so I started over and put all my points into strength. At
first I wasn't sure it was a good idea because I seemed to be missing a lot
of notes but now at level 12 I rarely ever miss a note. I think putting it
all into strength is the way to go. Having a 100 strength comes in handy.

Arden
Cazic-Thule
